sense.gloss: to apply pressure from above, to press down
to stamp (i.e. a passport), to apply a seal
to press (someone for something), to urge, to compel, to influence
to overwhelm, to overpower, to repress
to push (events along), to advance (a plan)
to do in spite of ..., to do even though ..., to force

x: 念を押す・ねんをおす
駄目を押す・だめをおす

sense.gloss: (of light) to be diffused across an entire surface

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑考↑↓かんが↓えることが↑多↑↓お|お↓↑過↑↓す|↓ぎる。
sdata.e: I have too many things on my mind these days.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓から↑考↑↓かんが↓えて、↑我々↑↓われわれ↓の↑計画↑↓けいかく↓は↑練↑↓ね↓り↑直↑↓な|お↓す|べきだと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: In the light of what you told us, I think we should revise our plan.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓はいかが|お↑過↑↓す|↓ごしですか。
sdata.e: How are you getting along these days?

sdata.j: ↑近頃↑↓ちかごろ↓は、どのように|お↑過↑↓す|↓ごしですか。
sdata.e: How are you getting along these days?

sdata.j: ↑近頃↑↓ちかごろ↓はいかが|お↑過↑↓す|↓ごしでしょうか。
sdata.e: How are you getting along these days?

sdata.j: このところいかが|お↑過↑↓す|↓ごしですか。
sdata.e: How are you getting along these days?

sdata.j: ↑禁煙↑↓きんえん↓を|お↑勧↑↓す|す↓めします。
sdata.e: I advise you to stop smoking.

sdata.j: ↑癌↑↓がん↓は↑発見↑↓はっけん↓が↑間↑↓ま↓に↑合↑↓あ↓えば、↑治↑↓な|お↓す|ことができる。
sdata.e: Cancer can be cured if discovered in time.
